summary: Diff introduces a Draft Version 64 build label and a number of frontend/UI/UX and configuration changes. It does not provide evidence that the codebase/configuration was actually restored to match the historical Draft Version 64, nor does it provide evidence of successful IC deployment/build completion. Several unrequested features/changes (branding/theme consolidation, sitemap/favicon, admin editor UI changes, error boundary/routing/auth behavior changes) appear to go beyond a “restore/redeploy only” request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the application codebase to match Draft Version 64 and redeploy it as a new draft so the user can continue from Version 64 instead of the currently deployed Draft Version 68.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows adding a Draft Version 64 label (buildInfo) but does not include evidence of reverting/restoring the broader code/configuration to the exact Draft Version 64 state, nor any redeploy-related changes or artifacts demonstrating the deployed draft is based on Version 64.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the restored Draft Version 64 build completes successfully and deploys to the Internet Computer without build/deployment errors (address any issues that prevent the Version 64 deployment from succeeding).
missing_requirements.reason: No build/deployment logs, canister/deploy config changes, or other concrete evidence is included to confirm the frontend build and backend canister deployment complete without errors and core pages render successfully.

hallucinated_features.description: Added build metadata module and UI display of “Draft Version 64”.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 asks to restore/redeploy to Draft Version 64, but adding new build tracking code and exposing it in the footer is an implementation change not explicitly requested as part of restoration.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded ErrorBoundary UI and additional error handling/navigation behavior in App routing/auth flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; goes beyond restore/redeploy and may constitute new behavior/features.

hallucinated_features.description: Branding/theme redesign and consolidation to a two-color (red/blue) system across multiple pages and global styles/tailwind configuration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly disallowed as a non-goal (“UI redesign or branding changes unrelated to restoring/redeploying Draft Version 64”).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified SEO and static site artifacts (sitemap.xml, favicon path fixes, Google Search Console verification, sitemap link).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and outside restore/redeploy scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin panel syllabus editor UI enlargement and related admin UI work.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; constitutes new/changed product behavior/UI beyond restoring Draft Version 64.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed Stripe checkout session handling and mock test purchase flow (e.g., mutation call shape, parsing hardening).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; functional changes beyond restoration.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer and header content/branding/social links and contact section changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and may be considered branding/UI changes beyond restoration.
